title: Monocacy National Battlefield: Getting Around
body: Explore This Park    Plan Your Visit     Directions & Transportation     Getting Around              Getting Around           Monocacy National Battlefield Auto Tour   A self-guided auto tour, using public roads, is the best method for getting around the battlefield. Five walking trails provide additional opportunities to get out of your car and enjoy a more contemplative experience.   A note to our visitors and bus tour groups: Please be respectful of our park neighbors and do not park cars or tour buses in residential driveways or church parking lots. Please use designated visitor parking areas shown on the map at left and on your brochure. Thank you.
